subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Figure Skating
Grief (Emotions)
lead_paragraph: Grieving her mother’s death, the figure skater Joannie Rochette thought about leaving the Games, but knew that would not have been what her mother wanted.
snippet: Grieving her mother’s death, the figure skater Joannie Rochette thought about leaving the Games, but knew that would not have been what her mother wanted.
